Description:
Go away from monsters and hunters around the ancient ruins. Play for Oddworld Abe in a remake of the classic PlayStation - Abe's Oddysee. Abe was happy polisher on a meat factory Oddworld, but learned a secret plan boss: make slaves of meats RuptureFarms Tasty Treats. Now Abe saved from grinder. Escape from the slaughterhouse - just the beginning of an odyssey! Path to the heritage of his people thorny. The game New 'n' Tasty improved graphics and sound, worked gameplay - a new life of the original game Oddworld!
Features:
- The game is now divided into more levels, where the camera follows Abe - sometimes approaching or slightly deviates to give the player a better view. 
- All characters and scenery are now made Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹in 3D - and look very impressive: on the walls of ancient temples can be seen tiniest cracks ; paramitas and arachnids like crab-mutants scrubs seem even more disgusting than before; mines threatening winking red lights, lasers flicker dimly gleaming smokestacks. 
- While the appearance of the New 'n' Tasty polished gameplay in the game remained virtually unchanged. As before, Abe can not attack enemies directly - instead, it adjusts them to the trap throws grenades, makes attack each other, and even dominates some opponents using telepathy. Toward the end of the heroic adventures mudokon acquires superpowers, allowing one stroke clear the screen of all mines and villains, but it is not used too often. 
- In other words, for the passing game will have to demonstrate not shooting skills and observation, the ability to plan and patience. Basically Finally, in New 'n' Tasty hero dies with the same ease as in the original game, except that the checkpoint is now caught a little more often.
